archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Track Product Capability Business Case Costs
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description These processes track and ensure that the business case cost parameters are met for all required product infrastructure capabilities. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory Reserved for future use.
